title: London Underground
description: The London Underground, part of Transport for London, is characterized by its distinctive brand colors. The primary blue color, represented by the hex code #000099, symbolizes the identity of the London Underground transportation system, while the red color #CC3333 is used in the iconic logo and signage. These colors are well-known from Transport for London's official branding and promotional materials, as indicated by their open data resources for design and branding.
